familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $5,001 - $15,000 in Interest Capital Gains income from KF- RCG Longview Debt Fund IV, LLC (Financial investments in RCG Longview Debt Fund IV LP; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: KF- RCG Longview Debt Fund IV LLC (Financial Investments In RCG Longview Debt Fund IV LP; New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $5,001 - $15,000 in Capital Gains Interest income from KF- RCG Longview Debt Fund IV, LLC (Financial investments in RCG Longview Debt Fund IV LP; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested. Income amount is estimated.
familyMemberEthics.business: KF- RCG Longview Debt Fund IV LLC (Financial Investments In RCG Longview Debt Fund IV LP; New York, NY)

familyMemberEthics.description: Another asset of Jared Kushner's, KF- RCG Longview Debt Fund IV, LLC, is reportedly invested in RCG Longview Debt Fund IV, LLC. However, RCG Longview Debt Fund IV, LLC is not included in his 2017 financial disclosure. Because the investment vehicle reportedly has been divested, this record is categorized as a resolved potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: RCG Longview Debt Fund IV LP; New York, NY
